title: Saudi Arabia cracks down: Over 20,000 arrested for residency, labour and border law violations
summary_full: Saudi security agencies arrested over 20,000 individuals for violating residency, labor, and border laws during intensified enforcement operations. The crackdown, which also saw 11,656 deportations, targeted illegal residents and those aiding them. Authorities continue to warn against facilitating illegal entry, with severe penalties for offenders.
